content: @James Agnew will parts of complex filtering be supported in the upcoming 4.2.0? (https://github.com/jamesagnew/hapi-fhir/issues/1577)

I'm not aware of anyone currently working on this ticket, no. Contributions are of course welcome. I'm also always happy to provide an overview of the codebase to anyone who wants to try and tackle it. (And naturally, a support contract could also be used to force the issue)
We'll have a deeper look into it. If deemed infeasible to fix within our internal allocated time frame a support contract could be a way to go
